Reviews.Title: BUYER BEWARE!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Shirley Crowder
Reviews.Content: THESE ARE FAKE SAMSUNG GALAXY 3's.....SAVE YOUR $$ AND GO ELSEWHERE!!!!  THIS COMPANY IS A SCAM. I TOOK THIS PHONE TO A REPUTABLE PHONE REPAIR SHOP AND THEY TOOK IT APART TO DISCOVER THAT IT IS A FAKE.....YOU CAN'T GET PARTS EVEN WHEN SOMETHING GOES WRONG.  I HAVE HAD THIS THING FOR ABOUT 45 DAYS AND IT IS JUNK....IF I COULD GIVE IT 0 STARS I WOULD.  I HAVE CONTACTED AMAZON AND STARTED THE APPEAL PROCESS. TAKING THIS MAN TO COURT IF I HAVE TO!!!

Reviews.Title: Fake phone
Reviews.Author: Ni14
Reviews.Content: Be aware! These are fake Samsung phones. The guy told me that it's original but he sent me a fake one. Make sure the package has serial number on it.

Reviews.Title: The teefono that I get is Chinese. and buy thinking it was the original.
Reviews.Author: José Pedrique
Reviews.Content: This guy sold me a copy Chinese and made ​​me think it was original. I need my money back or change it to me!

Reviews.Title: Not all Sim cards works
Reviews.Author: pharon rodgers "slow down"
Reviews.Content: I'm having the hardest time trying to find a Sim card that will actually work in the Samsung Galaxy S3 I9300. I'm in a rural area, which increases the search.

Reviews.Title: f u c king garbage
Reviews.Author: RICK LIAO
Reviews.Content: the screen is freeze ， power cant turn on ，happen like this everyday，bad phone，iphone！ better then this garbage ！ ！

Reviews.Title: My phone didn't recognise my sim card!
Reviews.Author: dingo
Reviews.Content: My phone didn't recognise my sim card, so because of that I changed the sim slot, after that I had the same problem. Then the guy from my local service realise that my phone doesn't has some code and now I should pay for that 40 euros.

Reviews.Title: Having no problem.
Reviews.Author: Andras Agoston Dobner
Reviews.Content: It have no problem. The only thinkg I'm not satisfied with is that Samsung S3 have some irritating property that make it hard to use, illogic.

Reviews.Title: Buen producto
Reviews.Author: Moises Benitez
Reviews.Content: Excelente todo bien, este celular es de primera superó mis espectativas y funciona a la perfección aqui en venezuela, lo recomiendo completamente.

Reviews.Title: Oakland Wireless - the scam masters
Reviews.Author: HG
Reviews.Content: Stay away of Oakland Wireless. they sold me a junk with a defective chip and lifeless battery. I bought it as a gift. I guess I was another one who payed for their scam.Star rating required for the review?!

Reviews.Title: It's says unlocked but it is all locked
Reviews.Author: Kdshrestha
Reviews.Content: It's didnot work international  it says unlock but if you try out of country they say we have to download software and it never worked

Reviews.Title: Excellent cell phone
Reviews.Author: Kokouvi Agle
Reviews.Content: This cell phone was very well. It came in a nice box. I'm so glad I got one. I really like this cell phone features.Thanks

Reviews.Title: 2 Samsung S3 pending payment
Reviews.Author: Luis Fonseca
Reviews.Content: Good morning! yesterday made ​​a purchase two samsung s3 with gift card but still have not cashed the product. What is the reason? this is the order 103-3480409-8785828

Reviews.Title: phone not working rite
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: im having trouble with the phone . about 3 weeks after I got it I started to experance trouble with it .started to tune off and then back on by itself until I jyust stopped using it im  not sure of what to do with it I thru away the paper wok away if u could help me please let me no . this is the first item I ever bought on line

Reviews.Title: its perfect
Reviews.Author: Maike
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. it works perfectly fine and the camera is really good. i am so happy to have it :)

Reviews.Title: Responsive company, KNOW the difference between GSM and other phones...
Reviews.Author: frustrated
Reviews.Content: I'm sure the phone would have worked just fine but I was looking for a phone that works on Verizon networks.  The information specified that it was a GSM phone but one needs to know what this means - of course I did not.  The company promptly provided me with a refund after deducting a $25.00 restocking fee.  No issues with the company but the information could have been more clear about which networks the phone will work on.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Leonard
Reviews.Content: Great phone. Works perfectly in Venezuela. Loved it from the first second I got it. Highly recommend it. The only down point is that the battery doesn't last much

Reviews.Title: Excelent product
Reviews.Author: Omar Ortiz
Reviews.Content: It's one of the best Cellphones I've ever hadIt's bigger, faster, more comfortable and very easy to useI recommend it for those who love technology

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: alessa
Reviews.Content: very good product, i didnt have problem, is importar producto for de people. is complement for me in my life

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Alexandre Pépin
Reviews.Content: Great phone, I'm familiar with iOS and I have to agree with the fact that Android is great peace of software. The phone is slick and trendy, I wish it had more battery. You can add up as much memory you want so it does not matter the internal memory of the phone to start with.  The cam is good for what you want to use it for (I mean, it's not an SLR cam!)

Reviews.Title: The best phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for about 6 months now and I still love it! The blue looks really good.

Reviews.Title: not too good
Reviews.Author: mave
Reviews.Content: I've got 2 cell phones.. but one of them have the earpiece  like loose, and the battery doesn't work... probably that is the reason why in the box there are two batterys... and the package was delivered one day after the estimated date, after i asked to the seller what happened.. it's too bad, because i've got others new unlocked phones, and everything is perfect... i don't know exactly how is working the other phone that i' ve got

Reviews.Title: Excellent cell
Reviews.Author: isela romero
Reviews.Content: if 100% recommend this product as it is very efficient, safe, easy to acquire, is an excellent phone with unique acquisition

Reviews.Title: What Can I say, I love it!
Reviews.Author: Alexander Graham Bell Very-Junior
Reviews.Content: Fully two years after it was launched, and I am still using it because the competition was only able to match some of its features but not all, not really. If you are in the market for a Smart Phone, this should not be perceived as an old technology, it is not, it still is competing with only one or two devices that have just come out on the market.Galaxy S III Rules.

Reviews.Title: thanks anyway
Reviews.Author: roro
Reviews.Content: it was different from what i expectedit was not an international version , it was dual core !! thanks anyway

Reviews.Title: Phone is great, but DO NOT get this for TMobile.
Reviews.Author: Sammi
Reviews.Content: The phone is FUN and better than iphone. lots of FUN things to play with and more free apps (while iphone apps need to pay). HOWEVER, if you want to use it for TMobile, it sucks. Data always just keep loading, loading, and loading. Finally it STOPPED or DROPPED!!! If you want to get this for Tmobile, think twice. I'll need to change the carrier to ATT instead....OR I guess Tmobile just sucks.

ProductInfo.Features:
Network: EDGE / GPRS (850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900MHz); HSPA+21 (850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100); 4G ( Dependent on Market ); Wi-Fi Direct; NFC; DLNA, MHL 1.0, HDMI 2 support;
OS: Android 4.0 (ICS); Internal Memory: 16 GB; MicroSD (upto 64 GB); Micro USB; 1.4GHz Quad Core Processor; Samsung Kies
Camera: 8 Megapixels Camera Resolution (Rear); 1.9MP (Front); HD recording @ 30fps with Zero Shutter Lag
Battery Capacity: 2,100mAh Li-ion Battery
4.8 HD Super AMOLED Display: This is what we call seeing reality, 4.8 inches of high definition display and vivid viewing experience. With true colors and ultrafast response times, HD video playback is outrageously sharp.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy S3 i9300 16GB - Unlocked International Version No Warranty White
